document.full_text: "american idol" producers said on wednesday they are considering tweaking the voting system on the top-rated tv contest to correct a bias toward male contestants by the show's largely female audience.
document.title: "american idol" mulls voting tweaks to fix boy bias
lines_and_colors: "american idol" producers said on wednesday they are considering tweaking the voting system on the top-rated tv contest to correct a bias toward male contestants by the show's largely female audience.
